abstract: Saab Automobile, the Swedish brand that was rescued from near death early this year by a Dutch manufacturer of high-end sports cars, may soon be getting some German help as well.
snippet: Saab Automobile, the Swedish brand that was rescued from near death early this year by a Dutch manufacturer of high-end sports cars, may soon be getting some German help as well.
lead_paragraph: Saab Automobile, the Swedish brand that was rescued from near death early this year by a Dutch manufacturer of high-end sports cars, may soon be getting some German help as well, Jack Ewing writes in The New York Times.

headline.main: Saab Talks With BMW About Forming Alliance
